amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to carry out Fast Letter 13-10 or create or maintain certain patient record-keeping systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2785 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2785 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 2763. (consideration: CR S7878-7881; text: CR S7879) To prohibit the use of funds to carry out Fast Letter 13-10 or create or maintain certain patient record-keeping systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2785 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2785 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 2763.
